Updated November     pm



To celebrate the arrival of executive producer Taylor Sheridans ratingsbusting contemporary Western saga on CBS we lassoed some fun facts about the drama PERIOD

See what goes into making this epic tale centered around rich Montana ranch owner John Dutton Kevin Costner whos willing to lie cheat and kill to keep his familys land from developers and the local tribe PERIOD

But the Oscar winner wasnt the only cast member who didnt have to audition PERIOD Shooins Cole Hauser as Johns righthand man Rip Wheeler and Gil Birmingham as Chief Thomas Rainwater who alternates between Dutton friend and foe PERIOD

He grew up partly on a Texas ranch has partaken in riding competitions and has appeared on the show as horse trader Travis Wheatley PERIOD

But her character Johns badass corporateshark daughter Beth Dutton is on horseback the least PERIOD The British Reilly grew up using English saddles not Western PERIOD

He also runs craft service the department that supplies meals to cast and crew PERIOD

Luke Grimes who plays Johns youngest Kayce recently stepped in after watching his double do a herding scene on horseback PERIOD

Its to reflect the lawyers journey from pleasing his dad to being his own man PERIOD

Yellowstone Sundays 87c CBS

This is an excerpt from TV Guide Magazines  Returning Favorites issue PERIOD For more first looks at falls returning showspick up the issue on newsstands now PERIOD
